thread.section_title: WholeLatteLove.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WholeLatteLove.com | www.wholelattelove.com | 33 of 40
thread.title: DAVID

author: DAVID
title: DAVID
text: I ordered an automatic machine that had some issues. After a couple very helpful sessions with WholeLatte Tech Support it was determined that a replacement machine was needed. They couldn't have been more professional about the entire transaction. There are of course other options as to where to shop but the prices were very competitive (as cheap as anyone else) and the support behind the sale outstanding.
